events.title: Nature Conservation Workshop
events.description: Learn about local flora and fauna conservation efforts.

events.title: Trail Cleanup Day
events.description: Join us in cleaning up local hiking trails.

events.title: Wilderness Survival Basics
events.description: Learn essential skills for surviving in the wilderness.

events.title: Hispanic Heritage Hike
events.description: Celebrate Hispanic Heritage Month with a community hike through scenic trails. Learn about contributions to environmental conservation from Hispanic leaders.

events.title: Sustainable Outdoor Cooking: Hispanic Cuisine Edition
events.description: Discover sustainable outdoor cooking techniques inspired by traditional Hispanic cuisine.

events.title: Eco-Friendly Fiesta: Celebrating Hispanic Heritage
events.description: Join us for a family-friendly fiesta celebrating Hispanic culture, with eco-friendly practices. Activities include music, dance, and environmental education.

events.title: Latinx Leaders in Sustainability Panel
events.description: Hear from influential Latinx leaders in environmental conservation and sustainability during this engaging panel discussion.
